level.heading: Exceptions from requirement of referral of application to National Capital Planning Commission.
level.text: Section 9-202.02(3) shall not apply to any application to close all or part of an alley in the circumstances enumerated in § 9-202.05(2), (4)(A), (5), or (6).

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 4-201
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 4-201, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 9-201.01.
